text: some of the featured art events include `` burial in space `` by woodpussy ( a group of musicians and pyro-technicians who blast their deceased founder into space in a rocket of their own creation ) ; `` nebulous entity `` and `` futura deluxe `` ( two large , roving installation pieces engineered using mathematics derived from fields of neural networks , ecological systems and fractals ) ; and a performance artist dea million who stages her `` wedding `` to america .

back_translation: Some of the featured artistic events include `` burial in Woodpussy space (a group of musicians and pyro-technicians who explode their deceased founder in a rocket of their own creation); `` Nebuleuse entity'' and `` Futura Deluxe `` (two large itinerant installation parts designed using mathematics derived from networks of neural, ecological and fractal systems); and a performance artist DEA which puts inscene his `` marriage '' in America.

text: a dark and quirky comedy set in an eccentric north london jewish old age home , paradise grove revolves around a dysfunctional family comprising 79-year-old izzie goldberg , determined to die with dignity , his daughter dee perry , a mixture of traditional jewish mother and child of the sixties , and her teenage son keith , who 's half-black and half-jewish , and understandably undergoing an identity crisis .

text: desperate to help his son , scott heads back home , leaving a substitute claus to watch over things at the pole .

text: the film tells the parallel , conflicting trajectory of five women : anita , isabel , adela , leire , and maricarmen .

text: fragmented , elliptical and overplotted to the point of being hard to track . still , it 's worth hanging in for the finish . . . [ when ] soderbergh pulls off a delicious trick , a gesture of pure , tender , unabashed movie love that makes up for everything .
translation: Fragmenté, elliptique et sur-tracé au point d'être difficile à suivre.Pourtant, ça vaut la peine de s'accrocher pour l'arrivée...[Quand] Soderbergh réalise une délicieuse astuce, un geste d'amour de film pur, tendre et sans vergogne qui compense tout.
back_translation: Fragmented, elliptical and over-traced to the point of being difficult to follow. Puttime, it's worth hanging for arrival ... [When] Soderbergh makes a delicious tip, a gesture of love of pure film, tender and shamelessly compensating everything.

translation: Ainsi, quand une famille jamaïcaine emménage à côté et construit un filet de cricket dans le jardin arrière, David est au septième paradis.
